title: Corrosive Flail
content:
udgeoning

Corrosive Strike: Deal additional Acid damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit, create a pool of acid around the target which reduces Armour Class by 2.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Acid was long ago abandoned by assassins, who found poison much more reliable in spiking their targets' drinks. The acid kept melting the chalices.
